muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: Change how the device buttons work globally.
muxtweakadv.Change how the font type works in the fr: Change how the font type works in the frontend. 'Theme' will ensure frontend will use fonts within themes with a fallback to language fonts. 'Language' will specifically use language based font.
muxtweakadv.Change the default audio level that the: Change the default audio level that the device will use each time it starts up.

muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: Change the default theme used for the next device launch.
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: Change the displayed battery percentage to improve accuracy based on calibration or known deviations in the battery capacity reading.

muxtweakadv.Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch unti: Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch until a network connection is established.
muxtweakadv.Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functiona: Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functionality.
muxtweakadv.Toggle startup and shutdown verbose mess: Toggle startup and shutdown verbose messages used for debugging faults.

muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: Toggle the system ability to automatically shut the device down due high temperature.
muxtweakadv.Toggle vibration for device startup, sle: Toggle vibration for device startup, sleep, and shutdown.
